audit_questions: Does the technical documentation include a general description of the AI system (intended purpose, provider, version, deployment)?
Is the development process documented (methods, design choices, data, human oversight)?
Are monitoring, functioning, and control of the system described?
Is risk management documented and linked to evidence?
Are relevant lifecycle changes and post-market monitoring plan documented?
Is there an EU declaration of conformity (or reference) for the high-risk AI system?
